title: Collection: Van Gogh's Masterpieces
description: Explore Vincent van Gogh's masterpieces in the museum's permanent exhibition. See his development as an artist in the museum galleries. Get to know his ideas and ambitions and step into Van Gogh's world.

title: Exhibition Vive l’impressionnisme!
description: 150 years of Impressionism! Join us to celebrate with an exhibition brimming with French masterpieces from Dutch collections. Discover the work of famous Impressionists including Claude Monet, Edgar Degas, Auguste Rodin and Camille Pissarro.

title: For Vincent’s Eyes Only. Drawings by Emile Bernard
description: An intimate glimpse into the artistic exchange of ideas between the friends Emile Bernard and Vincent van Gogh.
